Exclusive on Breaker - Venture Stories, a new podcast by Village Global. Venture Stories takes you inside the world of venture capital and technology, featuring enlightening interviews with entrepreneurs, investors and tech industry leaders. Hosted by Erik Torenberg.

New activity design! Activity is now grouped by similar types and there’s separate tabs for your friends’ activity and your own activity.

More fixes and improvements:
- Support for HomePod
- Automatically tweet episodes you’ve liked <3
- Fix for importing subscriptions from other apps
- Fixes for download bugs and keeping download info in sync
- Universal link support to open webpages in the Breaker iOS app
- See friends who liked and listened on the episode screen
- More haptic feedback for actions!

- New design for sending an episode - no comment required!
- Improved importing subscriptions (thanks Andy P)
- New email when a friend follows you
- Fix for hiding full-screen player when opening app from link or push notification (thanks Erik F)
- New Recently Listened cell design on the profile tab
- View downloaded episodes from your settings
- New icon and confetti for marking as listened
- Episode credit list includes dates published

No more clutter! Listened episodes are now automatically removed from your playlist. You can still easily find them in a new “Recently Listened” section, where you can quickly like, comment, or send the episode to a friend.

More fixes and improvements include:
- Fix for sender label in episode inbox (thanks Erik F, Simon B, and Will P)
- Sorting is faster for the Playlist, Subscriptions, and each show’s episodes

Audio playback fixes! We’ve fixed issues with multiple episodes playing at the same time, incorrect progress bars, and issues with skipping ahead/back.

More improvements:

- Smoother scrolling in the playlist, especially for older phones
- Fix for truncating descriptions with unicode (thanks こぱん)
- Option to mute subscriptions when unsubscribing
- Quick fix for displaying Skipped Silences in your profile
- Fix for the search bar disappearing on the Discover tab
- Fixes for a couple of crashes in the playlist
- New “add friend” icon

Private accounts are the newest feature on Breaker. If you’d only like to share your podcast activity with your friends, you can now choose to be private on Breaker.

More fixes:
- Fix for end of episode sleep timer (thanks Edward Y and Patrick S)
- Fix for recommended shows with no subscribers (thanks Krishna P and Mark E)
- Fix for activity with lots of subscriptions, likes, or listens
- View who sent you an episode in your playlist

Did you like the episode you listened to? Like it or share it! With special heart confetti <3

We hear you. We’ve removed the Recently Listened section from the Playlist and only remove episodes from your playlist when they’re 100% complete.

More fixes:
- Images are much faster! Yay!
- Fix for saving progress with audio interruption (thanks Katie G!)
- New push notification for trending episodes
- More private user follow options on your own profile
- Fix for registering device tokens for push notifications

Chat about podcast episodes on Breaker! New!

Send an episode to a friend, they’ll get notified, and you can both chat about it on Breaker. Previously, you could send an episode but now you can reply to episodes sent to you as well.

More fixes:
- Peek and pop - press on episodes to quickly view their description
- Performance improvements for lists (thanks Ryan S)
- Fix for UI when accepting and declining follow requests (thanks Ade O)
- Fixes for resuming audio from background (thanks Josh C)
- Fix for removing marked as listened episodes from Continue Listening (thanks Josh C)

What’s a toast? It’s a quick message that pops up in the app to say “Success!”
Check out Breaker’s newly designed toasts.

More updates:
- More confetti - it falls for longer!
- Confetti when an episode ends
- Fix for too many prompts for push notifications (thanks Joe N)
- Fix for private user button sizes (thanks Hunter W)
- Recommended show browsing (thanks arc geek)
- Fix for long names in navigation titles (thanks Joe F)
- Discover tab is now faster loading
- Fix for buttons in search
- Fix for zooming on images
- Link to “Share the app” in settings

- Fix for black screen when logging in (thanks Liam B and Patrick P)

Breaker now offers premium podcasts and episodes for purchase. We've partnered with several podcasters to bring you new content from the podcasts you love!

Podcasts and episode with a purple "Premium" flag are available for purchase directly through the app. Please contact us at feedback@breaker.audio if you have any questions or thoughts on our new premium podcasts.

We’re back and better than ever!

This update includes a lot of highly-requested bug fixes and improvements, including:

- Download more episodes in the playlist and keep them downloaded
- Fix for play/pause buttons not working when back online
- Audio buffer management fixes for spotty internet
- Fix for logging in with Twitter when Twitter app isn’t installed
- Default share sheet with better Twitter support
- Display price on episodes of premium shows
- Warning when unsubscribing from a premium show that you need to go to your App Store Account Settings
- Skip over unpaid premium episodes when playing in the playlist
- Prettier premium subscription screen

Chapters! If an episode supports chapters, tap the chapter button on the full-screen player to view the chapters. Skip to a chapter by selecting it in the list. Chapter artwork will automatically appear on the full-screen player.

- Fix for crash when nothing in playlist (thanks Allen L)
- Setting the custom playback rate no longer updates the rate for other shows (thanks Edward Y)
- Make sure to only calculate durations on WiFi or for downloaded episodes (thanks Chris V)

New home design! We hope you like it!!!

We’ve redesigned our home screen to be easier to discover new episodes. With personalized recommendations, categories, episodes that your friends are listening to, and premium episodes, we hope you can find something cool to listen to.

There’s also a new Library tab for your Playlist, Subscriptions, and Downloads. Now it’s easy to download episodes by tapping the download button from the home screen.

Let us know what you think at feedback@breaker.audio!

Other updates:

- Better image caching! Images load and appear faster.
- Double-tap on Discover tab to open search (thanks Alex)
- Fix for push notification prompt only if not seen (thanks Caitlin S)
- Fix for comment view showing when it shouldn’t
- Updated error message text for missing audio
- Fix for more link in show screen description

New! Share podcast snippets with Bullet!

Bullet is an iOS app for sharing snippets of podcasts on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and more. You can make a short clip of any episode and export it as a video with transcription and nice graphics. Now you can share directly from Breaker by tapping the “Share snippet with Bullet” button in the share sheet for an episode. We’re so happy to have podcast snippet sharing via our friends at Bullet!

More updates:
- Fix for an issue with loading at saved playback time
- Activity feed displays whether a friend followed you via Twitter or Facebook
- Hide download button for premium, Patrons-only, and archived episodes

Download improvements! We’re always working to improve downloads but this is a big update.

- Episodes download in a consistent order
- Currently playing episode won’t be removed from downloads
- Better respect for file storage constraints
- audio/mp4 files are saved as mp4 instead of mp3

Other updates:
- Shareable playlists no longer delete episodes after listening
- Prompts to enable push notifications for things you might want to be notified about
- Fixes when dismissing an episode from the player
- Fixes for dismissing the player when an episode ends
- Fixes spacing issues with discover and search results screens

Yay Breaker 1.0.0!!
We’re so excited to release the new version of Breaker with some big changes...

New icon *
Check out our shiny new app icon.

New tabs *
Now there’s now three tabs (instead of five): Discover, Playlists, and Subscriptions. What was previously on Home and Search is now combined into one Discover tab with lots of episode recommendations and search functionality. Based on your feedback, we’ve split out your Subscriptions into their own tab so that you can easily get to your favorite shows. Don’t worry, your Profile and Activity hasn’t gone away - it’s just moved to a cute profile icon in the top left.

No log in required *
New users can try Breaker right away and listen to the best episodes without needing to create an account. After creating an account you can subscribe to shows, like episodes, comment, and create playlists.

Give the new Breaker a try and let us know what you think!
